cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a truck that can really move a lot of stuff....yay for this truck.
This is basically a car that is on its last legs but it'd be good to have around because it's whatever man..
This one is cool to have if you want to get go off roading and camping. Throw your stuff in there too.
Price is steep but you will be able to timr travel with the built in flex-capicitor.
This car still accelerates like no other. Have fun racing on the freeway.
Kermit the frog and Fozzy would be proud.
This is a complete shit wagon that no one would want but does only cost 5 bucks, so why not.
